messages: 1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (23:21): align="left|right" will induce text to wrap around the graphic :D
77194253ee065122d06a4a8fecbc35bd (23:23): Align is a deprecated attribute.  Use CSS instead.
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (23:34): use STYLE="float:left|right;" to have text wrap around an img :x
5a216969994249cbaf3c686ec0f1def9 (23:41): If I have a jpg that is 3"x4" and at 300 dpi, how can I make it show up at 3"x4" 300 dpi instead of 900x1200 pixels?
77194253ee065122d06a4a8fecbc35bd (23:43): I guess you can use CSS to set the width/height..
5a216969994249cbaf3c686ec0f1def9 (23:44): riczho, but will it then be at 300 dpi or is the browser just doing all the work to resize the image?

5a216969994249cbaf3c686ec0f1def9 (23:45): riczho, but will it then be at 300 dpi or is the browser just doing all the work to resize the image resulting in an image that is smaller but still not 300 dpi in the browser?
77194253ee065122d06a4a8fecbc35bd (23:47): AssociateX: I'm actually not sure about that...  try and see, I guess.
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (23:48): the image will render at 72 dpi but its "source" will be 300 dpi
77194253ee065122d06a4a8fecbc35bd (23:49): Oh-- then I have no idea.
72497cdf35324734fbd28572c5be08d3 (23:50): ed-209, use some consistency with tag names/attributes though :)
72497cdf35324734fbd28572c5be08d3 (23:51): <iMg StYlE="height: 216;" sRc="foo.png"> might be valid in HTML4, but its damn hard to read :(
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (23:54): look, everything I know about html/css I've learned from looking at source code and online tutorials
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (23:54): I think my first css tutorial put everything STYLE
5a216969994249cbaf3c686ec0f1def9 (00:01): so webpages display images at 72 dpi?
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (00:06): graphics are displayed at "72 pixels per inch"
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (00:06): which is almost never really 72 pixels per inch on today's monitors
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (00:06): however, the computer thinks it is.. thats good enough
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (00:07): the browser will resize images no problem
1477127bf002f514dcb66c325ef8401c (00:07): however, it will download the full source image
